item.title: fragment-22_a.whispers-of-the-weave.msp
item.description: [FRAGMENT RETRIEVED FROM MUSPACE BY DXV OPERATOR/LOOM-WEAVER GASPODE] [VERIFIED BY DIRECT-LINK-THREAD LOOM SENSOR] I am one of the Weavers, those who spin the threads of the Loom of Time, who travel the worlds of the Weave, of the infinite tapestry of all possibility.

item.title: Retrieved article: RARE TRADER GUILD WARS
item.description: Welcome to the DIGITAL CRADLE Histories DXV Interface v1011.514. Enter a command or “help” to see a list of commands.

item.title: telemageddon
item.description: Unhoused telemageddon, born late and orphan, turned to literal tramp. Combing the ultrawastes level in his NO-CARRIER wagon he never ventures far from the old stagecoach routes.

item.title: □SECTOR C-20 NEUROPACIFICA\WINDOWS ANOMALY
item.description: You gaze out of your windows onto the night-sky - what is that, rotating east? A great black dot: not a satellite and not a bird… Waveforms, as if a great black void of space was chewing at itself.

item.title: □THE LAST OF THE CYBER-QUEENS
item.description: The last of the CYBER-QUEENS lies dying in her underground villa. Her cerulean-and-silver clad body lies tangled in a tangle of wires, source code and cult protocols, vaguely feline with long and bristly spines of stiff hair hanging down her back and a crown in the form of an asymmetric cybernetic radio.

item.title: □XENOTOXIC CHRONICLE ARCHIVE FRAGMENT #100385103
item.description: When I was young and first set foot in the METAOASIS, I was a brilliant student, engineering star of the gravipulse theories, a conventional renaissance mathmagician hacking the data-tapestry of the WEAVE from elegant speed and the beautiful surface trickery.

item.title: □Y\SECTOR C-18: OLD MACHINES AND THE MAD CAPTAIN
item.description: ☽ Do not stare into their open eyes: they are roaming CULT DRONES and TEXTUAL COLLECTIONS of DARK TYPE, leaking darkness and information onto the substrata.
